ingredients: 1 (9 inch) pie crust pastry,   +   1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 cup brown sugar, 1   +   1/2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground allspice,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 pinch ground cinnamon, 2  eggs, 5  Bartlett pears, peeled and chopped
nutrition: Total Fat 21g 26%, Saturated Fat 10g 48%, Cholesterol 77mg 26%, Sodium 212mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 47g 17%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 4mg 22%, Calcium 33mg 3%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 176mg 4%
